Headline: #3 King Drive & #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive & 151 Sheridan buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, &  Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, & Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive & #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Hubbard, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
